about_the_game:
Welcome to Fotoboy Flashstar, where a camera is your best friend, and charm is your greatest weapon!

Step into the shoes of Kin, a freelance photographer with a knack for getting into (and out of) tricky situations! In this amusingly sexy top-down pixel adventure, you'll explore a vibrant town brimming with quirky characters, attractive ladies, and plenty of opportunities to snap the perfect shot!

It's your job to meet the town's loveliest ladies, complete their requests, and -if you’re charming enough- convince them to strike a pose for your latest spread. Whether it's fetching a lost item, showcasing your dancing skills, or simply lending a helping hand, each quest brings you closer to that perfect picture!

So grab your camera, flash your brightest smile, and get ready for an adventure!



  • Unique Storyline: Join Kin as he searches for willing models to pose for him. Can he find enough to complete his client’s request?
  • Top-Down Perspective: Explore the vibrant and dynamic world of Foto Boy through a visually engaging top-down perspective reminiscent of the old Pokémon games.
  • Lite Puzzles: light-hearted puzzles that add an extra layer of challenge to the game. Solve them to unlock new areas and advance in the storyline.
  • Character Dialogue: Enjoy playful, lighthearted interactions with the town's lovely ladies as you work your way into their good graces—and into their photoshoots!
  • Gotta photo them all! : Unleash your inner photographer and capture stunning pics of beautiful girls! The game features a unique mechanic where players can take and collect a variety of photos of 10 women.
  • Test your skills and enjoy entertaining minigames.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains suggestive themes and innuendos, presented in a pixel art, top-down style.

Players assume the role of Kin, who joins an all-female company that subtly implies the production of adult-themed toys, though these are neither shown nor explicitly mentioned. 

As part of the storyline, Kin is tasked with photographing his colleagues. Out of ten photos, two depict characters with some cleavage, and one features a character in a skin-tight outfit holding a whip, referencing S&M themes.

The dialogue includes light-hearted innuendos and suggestive remarks without explicit language.

Overall, the game presents non-explicit sexual content and mild suggestive dialogue in a humorous and subtle manner.

name: Foto Boy: Flashstar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Athlon
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: ANY

short_description: Join Kin, a freelance photographer, in Fotoboy Flashstar- a sexy, top-down pixel adventure! Explore a vibrant town, meet captivating ladies, and complete quirky quests to earn their trust and capture stunning photos. Use your charm, solve puzzles, and enjoy fun minigames in this hilarious journey!
